title: Providing for independence in learning (TEFC)
creator_credit: Robert E. Gilbert and Kismet Films
brief_description: Outlines the need for providing children with the opportunity and skills for independent learning. Points out the role of the school and the library in developing self direction skills and providing opportunities for the disadvantaged child.
